reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Life Beyond Plastic Mobilitazione giovanile e attivazione di buone pratiche per mitigare l’impatto antropico sull'ambiente e contribuire a ridurre l’inquinamento da plastica nei mari.
Life Beyond Plastic Youth mobilization and activation of good practices to mitigate the human impact on the environment and to contribute to reduce plastic pollution in the sea.
